about_the_game:
《Eggy Space》is a light and casual tower defense game operated on the computer. The game is set in a fictional world, where due to the scarcity of resources, players play as interstellar travelers shuttling between various planets. While resisting the invaders, they also need to acquire resources. By placing props in the levels, defeating the invading races from other planets, and acquiring resources to upgrade the spaceship and recruit crew members, the players can continuously pass the levels. Eventually, they will obtain a habitable planet and rebuild their homes.

The game provides a variety of mechanisms. Players can place blocks such as ground or wall mechanisms to achieve efficient killing of monsters. Different mechanism blocks will also have bonds, producing linked effects and achieving new killing effects. More clever combinations await your attempts!

Outside the level, players can upgrade the props to increase the damage of the mechanisms and unlock more mechanism effects; and they can also recruit various heroes through the external Ark module. Heroes will automatically explore resources and help players build resource output more efficiently.

At the current stage of the game, we are still in a semi-complete state. Under the integrity of the battle, we will quickly complete the content for battle development. Please look forward to it!

detailed_description:
About us

Who we are： ZuoDomain is a micro indie game studio founded in June 2019 by three people in their thirties from the game industry. We focus on the development of domestic indie games. Our dream is to create good games that are creative and have a certain depth. We have always believed that "one can only focus on one thing at the same time period", and we also enjoy only making one game at the same time and gradually realizing our dreams. Cooperation notice： We are not a large assembly-line custom game company, but a few game developers who have a heart to make and create good games, and make silent efforts. We really want to make a game and make a good one. Cooperation email: zuodomain@163.com


Adult content description

1. Our game does not have bloody and violent scenes, nor close-ups or nudity of sexy characters. 2. Our storyline does not involve adult topics, such as crime, sexual innuendo, or psychological thrillers. 3. Our interaction does not include simulations of sexual behavior or the selection and development of character relationships. 4. Our game does not use swear words, adult-themed conversations, or background sound effects. In summary, our game is a healthy, casual, and suitable game product for players of all ages between 6 and 50 years old to purchase and entertain.
